FdoGml212Schema Class Reference

#include <Schema.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

FdoGml212Schema is a utility class for handling the GML 2.1.2 version of the GML Schema.

Definition at line 29 of file Schema.h.


Static Public Member Functions

static FDO_API_COMMON FdoXmlReader * CreateReader ()
 Constructs an GML 2.1.2 schema reader. This reader reads an XML document containing the GML 2.1.2 and Xlinks schemas.
